channel.title: The Empathy Museum
channel.description:
https://youtu.be/60em6n_j8Io
[The Empathy Museum](https://youtu.be/60em6n_j8Io) is such a (literally) wonderful peer-to-peer combination of museum curation and experiential learning.
The books with no cover library is an apt reduction of the common book recommendation, and the mile in their shoes experience finds a good balance between personal emotional connections and asynchronous learning. @Robinbalser I think you'll like the 'darpness' of this kind of object sharing / recycling too.

item.title: The Empathy Museum
item.dc:creator: @stella Stella Kalac
item.description:
@stella wrote:

Thank you very much for sharing this inspiring concept of bringing the value of empathy to all citizens! I love it!

Read full topic
